chaos.entry: For the rest of the game wear a shoe like a hat. If it drops from your head you drink
Now your name is Bob. Everytime someones call you for your real name, he/she drinks
You Remember your arabic roots. Everytime someone drinks you have to scream like an arabic man, or drink if you forget to do it
You are a lion king fan. Everytime you drink raise your glass over your head with both hands or drink again.
Now your name is Betty. Everytime someones call you for your real name, he/she drinks
Now you are a groupie of Justin Beiber. Everytime someone drinks yell "I Love u Justin" with a sissy voice or drink
You were possessed by ghost pirate. Everytime someone drinks yell like one or drink if you forget to do it
An Ice witch cursed you. at the end of your turn stay frosty until someone picks the device or drink if you fail.
An evil clown cursed you. You cannot laugh for the rest of the game, drink if u do.
You are Dobby, a slave elf. If you need to rebuy booze, you go. If there was another dobby in the game, he is released and he has to say "Dobby is a free elf" and drink. This cannot be cleansed
You are the Lord of Chaos. Choose someone with a chaos rule and double its drink effect.Make a toast with the victim.
Your life is already too much chaotic, pick someone to get the device, and drink one.
Do like if you are Juggling with imaginary balls, drink if you drop them
Talk to someone like if you were talking to a baby. if she/he laughs, you drink. If both laugh, you drink x2
Make an animal sound. If someone says what animal is, you drink
Yell "THE GAME", everyone that loses drinks. You included, smart boy.
Now you are a preacher. Yell aleluya everytime someone drinks, or you drink.
Now you are the pope. Bless one player with your booze, if he/she curses you, you drink, but if he/she laughs, he/she drink.
Silence Spell!, you cannot talk for the rest of the game. Make someone read for you when is your turn, If you speak from now on, you drink. Important: you said "you drink", drink 1.
Self-Centered Spell! When a player says "Me", "My", or "I", he/she drinks
Negate Spell: For the rest of the game negate whatever you say, or drink.
Smurf Spell: if you are the shortest person of this game, everybody else drinks.
Giant Spell: if you are the tallest person of this game, everybody else drinks.
Cursed Mark: if cleanse is played, you drink x2
Better served cold Spell: if vendetta made you drink, the vendetta guy drinks x2
Reflect Mirror Spell: whenever someone makes you drink, that someone drinks too
Voodoo Shaman: you are immune to sacrifice drink effect
Guy Fawkes: you are immune to vendetta drinks
Wild Beast: if there is an animal in the house, whenever it touches someone, that someone drinks. If there are no animals you drink one and yell GreenPeace!
Deja Vu Spell: revive the last turn played when is your turn
Greedy: the player with most jewels drinks
Lust: Say something sexual loud o you drink
Gluttony: the most fat player drink
Wrath: whenever a player curses, he/she drinks
Sloth: whenever a player stays 3 turns without drinking, he/she drinks
Envy: the player with something red drinks
Pride: the player with more chaos rules drinks
Fluke drink; choose someone, he/she drinks. then he/she chooses another one.
